title: Why is the descriptive approach so neglected lately in scientific society? - Quora

response.answer_text: It isn't. A description is best offered to help peolle understand the ideas and derivations of equations that represent the relationships between the physical variables in questio. Basically, when looking at nature, she is mathematical but our appreciation of her is descriptive. We must use the mathematics to predict numbers to test our ideas. As Galileo once said, “ Mathematics is the pen with which God wrote the universe". So it behoves us to understand that nature's deepest findamental inner workings require mathematics.
